companies.name: VIET JAPAN PARTNER CO., LTD
companies.address: Room 22, House 8, Quang Trung City Software City, District 12, HCMC, Viet Nam

introduction.brief: VIET JAPAN PARTNER was established in October 2018 and serves as the representative company of the VIET JAPAN PARTNER Group (VJP Group), mainly operating in three fields: human resource development, information technology, and supporting business exchange between Vietnam and Japan.
details: Currently, VJP Group is headquartered in Ho Chi Minh City, with representative offices in Hanoi, Da Nang, and An Giang Province, employing a team of 25 staff members.
VJP Group's clients include Japanese companies, Japanese companies in Vietnam, or Vietnamese companies expanding into the Japanese market.
VJP Group aims to build an ecosystem service to support the business development activities of Vietnamese and Japanese companies.
VJP Group provides optimal and effective support for companies expanding their business in the partner country, based on the One Stop Service model, combining three key elements:
Expertise and experience of Japanese and Vietnamese specialists
VJP Group was founded by Mr.Thang Vo, who has over 10 years of work and study experience in Japan and holds a master's degree in IT from the Graduate School of Industrial Technology in Japan.
Additionally, VJP Group's team is supported by experts from Japan and Vietnam, along with passionate young staff.
VIET JAPAN PARTNER plays a central role in building this service ecosystem, with a mission to develop and nurture digital human resources that meet societal standards.
introduction.closing_message: If you are looking for a partner to support business between Vietnam and Japan, please contact us. We look forward to working with you!

companies.description: VIET JAPAN PARTNER was established in October 2018 and serves as the representative company of the VIET JAPAN PARTNER Group (VJP Group), mainly operating in three fields: human resource development, information technology, and supporting business exchange between Vietnam and Japan. Currently, VJP Group is headquartered in Ho Chi Minh City, with representative offices in Hanoi, Da Nang, and An Giang Province, employing a team of 25 staff members. VJP Group's clients include Japanese companies, Japanese companies in Vietnam, or Vietnamese companies expanding into the Japanese market.
companies.vision: To become the top company in Vietnam and Southeast Asia in training and supplying digital human resources according to Japanese standards, with the goal of training 10,000 personnel.
companies.mission: To contribute to the development of the digital economy by nurturing students through practical training based on Japanese standards and providing valuable support services to companies.

services.name: CONSULTING ON DOING BUSINESS IN VIETNAM
